p.k: The Freeride World Tour (FWT) expands to Asia!
p.d: The Freeride World Tour (FWT) expands to Asia! The season kick-off of the world’s most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders will be held at Hakuba (JPN), the first time ever the FWT stops in the Far East. The second stage of the tour will also guest at a new location, champagne powder paradise Kicking Horse near Golden, British Columbia (CAN). The series continues with the well-proven spectacular slopes of Vallnord-Arcalís (AND), Fieberbrunn (AUT), and Verbier (SUI).
